duties_responsibilities.duty: Document, maintain, and report on the enterprise risk management program.
Support the identification and measurement of key risk indicators for the enterprise to identify emerging risks.
Maintain ERM governance frameworks, standards, and practices and work to increase risk awareness.
Assist in the development of ERM policies and procedures.
Develop risk communications and standard tools, templates, policies, and procedures.
Prepare, distribute, and maintain plans, instructions, guidance, and standard operating procedures concerning risk management operations.
Provide advice on enterprise risk management activities pertaining to projects.
Track audit findings and recommendations to ensure that appropriate mitigation actions are taken.
Promote awareness of risk management issues among the organization.
Engage colleagues in the practice of identifying, managing, monitoring and communicating risks across the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience required, Master’s degree preferred
